titleStmt.title: Description of Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library, Penn CAJS: RAR MS 85.126.27a-b: Haggadah for Passover

publicationStmt.publisher: Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library

notesStmt.note: Divine name is spelled יוי; fully vocalized; some text breaks denoted by a colon. The folios contains almost all of the central segment of the Haggaddah, the Midrash on Deut. XXVI 5-9, from the end of the paragraph on ויגר שם to the end of recitation of the plagues ר' יהודה היה נותן בהם סימנים.

msIdentifier.repository: Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library

history.provenance: Cairo Genizah Collection (University of Pennsylania. Center for Advanced Judaic Studies. Library). Cairo Genizah Collection (Dropsie College. Library).
